attributes.review: We’re keeping American great by taking this app down... would rate 0 stars if I could
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: I honestly got the app to see the hyped but it’s that worse app I have ever installed and that’s saying a lot I would give it below 1 star if I could the downloading was a nightmare when I opened the app it was crashing not even opened for a second so I honestly don’t recommend having this app it’s honestly trash
attributes.title: Not worth it

attributes.review: first of all it took 8days to download which is absolutely unacceptable! when i finally used the app it made me login which took 7 hours!!! i had to sing every single justin beaver song to continue... and answer very weird questions like what i was wearing. then it had two options for race “White👑” and “other” which is unbelievable since trump is very supportive towards poc he even makes videos singing “i love black people 🎶” on the daily! once i got through it streamed very loud music to my tv and in the living room my cat was on the windowsill and she fell off and died! rip judy 😔💔 i think trump should pay for the funeral!!!! i’m disappointed in this app overall i give it two thumbs down 👎 👎
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.title: this app stinks

attributes.review: When I downloaded this it gave my phone a virus! I had to completely factory reset my phone. I lost all of my apps. And most of my pictures and contacts! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!!!!!! IT WILL COMPLETELY WRECK YOUR DEVICE!!!!! The virus just popped up the moment I finished downloading and started going through and sending all of my information to  the Chinese Government! They wanted my info to break into to great US government to install communist propaganda into the constitution!!!! BE CAREFUL! IT IS NOT WORTH THE RISK!
